description: France's president puts an end to speculation that the restored spire will be modern in style.
title: Notre Dame: Cathedral's spire will be restored to 19th Century design
title_page: Notre Dame: Cathedral's spire will be restored to 19th Century design - BBC News
maintext: The cathedral's first spire was built in the 13th Century, but due to extensive damage it was removed in the late 18th Century. Its replacement, designed by architect Eug¨¨ne Viollet-le-Duc, was built in the mid-19th Century.
